sense.gloss: until now, so far, up to the present
until (a time), till, to, up to
to (a place or person), as far as
to (an extent), up to, so far as, even
goes without saying, needless to say, obvious
obviously, as we all know, needless to say, of course, it goes without saying
so far, up to now, hitherto
that's enough (for today), it ends here
forever, eternally, for good, as long as one likes, indefinitely, endlessly, for a long time

sdata.j: それが↑今↑↓いま↓↑迄↑↓まで↓のところ↑一番↑↓いちばん↓いいスコアだ。
sdata.e: It's the best score up to now.

sdata.j: その↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓の↑会計↑↓かいけい↓↑年度↑↓ねんど↓は↑４月↑↓しがつ↓から↑翌年↑↓よくねん↓の↑３月↑↓さんがつ↓↑迄↑↓まで↓である。
sdata.e: The company's financial year runs from April until March of the following year.

sdata.j: そして、つい↑先日↑↓せんじつ↓↑迄↑↓まで↓、↑暗↑↓くら↓い↑感↑↓かん↓じだったのに、どこにもかしこにも↑花↑↓はな↓、↑花↑↓はな↓、↑花↑↓はな↓。
sdata.e: Then, although it was dreary up to the other day, everywhere were flowers, flowers, flowers.

sdata.j: ↑共産↑↓きょうさん↓↑主義↑↓しゅぎ↓は↑失敗↑↓しっぱい↓し、プロレタリア↑独裁↑↓どくさい↓は↑時代遅↑↓じだいおく↓れとなったので、↑資本↑↓しほん↓↑主義↑↓しゅぎ↓そのものは、↑未↑↓いま↓だ↑人類↑↓じんるい↓を↑脅↑↓おびや↓かすものであるにもかかわらず、↑今↑↓いま↓↑迄↑↓まで↓のところ↑一番↑↓いちばん↓↑良↑↓よ↓い↑体制↑↓たいせい↓であることがわかる。
sdata.e: Since communism became obsolete and the dictatorship of the proletariat is out of date, capitalism proves to be the best so far, even though it itself is still a threat for humanity.

words.gloss: until now, so far, up to the present
until (a time), till, to, up to
goes without saying, needless to say, obvious
